name: taskfmri
label: RECOVER-taskfMRI: two methods for analyzing motor and language fMRI tasks
description: Run FEAT GLM and permutation test with ICA analysis. Generate a report with the results.

fmriprep_dir.description: ZIP file containing the fMRIprep output directory (e.g., bids-fmriprep_<suffix>.zip)

design_template.description: Design template for the feat FSL analysis (.fsf format)

cluster_threshold.description: Cluster threshold value for post-thresholding z-map

author: Alice Wu, Kim Nyugen
